send(uint256).details: Calls Router to initiate CCIP send. The expectation is that s_msg_sequence will always match the sequence in emitted CCIP messages.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Client.EVMTokenAmount memory[] memory)
function (uint64,struct Client.EVM2AnyMessage memory) payable external returns (bytes32)

documentation.text:
@dev Calls Router to initiate CCIP send.
 The expectation is that s_msg_sequence will always match the sequence in emitted CCIP messages.
@title FacadeClient - A simple proxy for calling Router
